events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as you have relevant experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to provide dedicated support throughout the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening and would like to invite you to schedule a technical interview to discuss your development experience further.
Thank you for your prompt response. I am available next week for the technical interview and look forward to demonstrating my skills.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare for questions related to software engineering and devops practices.
The technical interview went well, with strong discussion on your software architecture experience and problem-solving skills.
Following the technical round, we have scheduled an HR interview to discuss cultural fit and role expectations. It will take place on May 14th.
The HR interview was successful, and you expressed great alignment with our companyâ€™s values and work environment.
We are pleased to propose you an employment offer for the Software Engineer position, including details on compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
Your acceptance of the offer has been recorded, and we are excited to have you onboard as a new software engineer.
The onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and equipment setup to ensure a smooth transition into your new engineering role.
The hiring process is officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering team as a full-time Software Engineer.
